propDefs.name: docker.image.name
propDefs.label: Docker Image Name
propDefs.description: Name of the Docker image to use with this component. i.e. tomcat, nginx, ubuntu

propDefs.name: docker.qualified.image
propDefs.label: Fully Qualified Docker Image
propDefs.description: Name to pass into pull command, in the form, [REGISTRY_HOST[:REGISTRY_PORT]/]NAME[:TAG]

propDefs.name: docker.registry
propDefs.label: Docker Registry
propDefs.description: Location of the docker registry used in pull commands

propDefs.name: docker.container.name
propDefs.label: Container Name
propDefs.description: Name to assign to the running docker container

automationPlugins.name: IBM UrbanCode Deploy Versioned File Storage
automationPlugins.description: A plugin to allow IBM UrbanCode Deploy to upload artifacts to CodeStation.

automationPlugins.name: Docker
automationPlugins.description: This plug-in includes steps to manage the lifecycle of Docker containers.

automationPlugins.name: Kubernetes
automationPlugins.description: This plug-in includes steps to work with resources and images in Kubernetes.

automationPlugins.name: File Utils
automationPlugins.description: The File Utils plug-in includes steps, such as deleting or creating directories and replacing tokens in a file, that perform folder-level and file-level tasks as part of a deployment process.

automationPlugins.name: Cloud Foundry IBM Containers
automationPlugins.description: Plugin for creating and managing Docker containers from within Cloud Foundry.

sourceConfigPlugins.name: Docker
sourceConfigPlugins.description: This Docker source plugin detects Docker registry image tags and creates associated component versions for the tag.

componentPropDefs.name: dockerImageName
componentPropDefs.label: Image Name
componentPropDefs.description: The [namespace/]repository of the image in the Docker registry.

componentPropDefs.name: dockerRegistryName
componentPropDefs.label: Registry
componentPropDefs.description: If image is host:5000/namespace/repository:tag use host:5000. Leave blank for Docker Hub. If Artifactory, supply the server's hostname or reverse proxy. Not required for Amazon ECR.

componentPropDefs.name: registryType
componentPropDefs.label: Registry Type
componentPropDefs.description: Specify which API to connect with the Docker Registry.When using IBM Containers, provide Bluemix Credentials. For Amazon ECR, use AWS access key as username and secret key as password

componentPropDefs.name: api
componentPropDefs.label: ICS API
componentPropDefs.description: For when importing from ICS. The api to use when logging in to CloudFoundry. If left blank, the api will not be reset.

componentPropDefs.name: space
componentPropDefs.label: ICS Space
componentPropDefs.description: For when importing from ICS. The space to log into. If left blank, the space will not be reset.

componentPropDefs.name: org
componentPropDefs.label: ICS Organization
componentPropDefs.description: For when importing from ICS. The organization to log into. If left blank, the api will not be reset.

componentPropDefs.name: CF_HOME
componentPropDefs.label: CF_HOME
componentPropDefs.description: For when importing from ICS. The CF_HOME environment variable specifies the location of config.json for authentication.

componentPropDefs.name: dockerRegistryUsername
componentPropDefs.label: Registry Username
componentPropDefs.description: The username used to login to the Docker registry.

componentPropDefs.name: dockerRegistryPassword
componentPropDefs.label: Registry Password
componentPropDefs.description: The password used to login to the Docker registry. Default value is ${p?:dockerPassword}

componentPropDefs.name: allowInsecure
componentPropDefs.label: Allow Insecure Registry Connection
componentPropDefs.description: Select this option to allow insecure connections to the Docker registry

componentPropDefs.name: namingConvention
componentPropDefs.label: Naming Convention
componentPropDefs.description: The naming convention for component versions. Docker tags can be changed. If component versions need to be immutable, select a naming convention that includes the ID.

componentPropDefs.name: region
componentPropDefs.label: AWS Region
componentPropDefs.description: Region to use when importing images from Amazon ECR.

componentPropDefs.name: awsCli
componentPropDefs.label: AWS Command Line File
componentPropDefs.description: Complete path of the AWS command line runtime file. Default: 'aws'

sourceConfigPlugins.name: File System (Versioned)
sourceConfigPlugins.description: The File System Versioned plugin automates uploading artifacts from a versioned file system.

componentPropDefs.name: basePath
componentPropDefs.label: Base Path
componentPropDefs.description: Specify the path to the directory that contains the artifacts. The content of each subdirectory within this base directory is considered a distinct component version. The subdirectory with the most recent timestamp is considered to be the latest version.

componentPropDefs.name: saveFileExecuteBits
componentPropDefs.label: Preserve Execute Permissions
componentPropDefs.description: For Linux and UNIX operating systems, select this check box to retain the execute permissions for each file.

componentPropDefs.name: extensions
componentPropDefs.label: Text File Extensions
componentPropDefs.description: If text-type files must be converted into another character set, type the list of file extensions to be converted. Matching file types are converted into the default character set of the system where the agent is located. Separate list items with commas.

componentPropDefs.name: includes
componentPropDefs.label: Include Files
componentPropDefs.description: Files included in the version upload. The default setting of **/* uploads all files. Separate files with commas or newline characters.

componentPropDefs.name: excludes
componentPropDefs.label: Exclude Files
componentPropDefs.description: Files excluded in the version upload. Separate files with commas or newline characters.
